refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the documentation for the given option name

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
Object oriented style
stringtidy::getOptDoc stringoptname
Procedural style
stringtidy_get_opt_doc tidyobject stringoptname
tidy_get_opt_doc returns the documentation for the given option name.
You need at least libtidy from 25 April, 2005 for this function be available.
